explains: adj. 市场的；可销售的；有销路的
wordGroup: marketable products 适销产品；有市场的产品；畅销产品

sentences.en: What began as an attempt at artistic creation has turned into a marketable commodity.
sentences.cn: 原本艺术创作上的一个尝试最终变成了一个可以出售的商品。

sentences.en: Furthermore, once they succeeded in making marketable flat glass, the machine was turned off for a service to prepare it for years of continuous production.
sentences.cn: 另外，一旦他们成功地生产出畅销的平板玻璃，为了让机器准备好连续几年的生产，这台机器会被停用以进行维护。

sentences.en: The type of computer may be very marketable in my.
sentences.cn: 这种型号的电脑可能很有销路。
